item.description:
Join P-Collective member Mo for the Brown University Jazz Combos concert!!!!

Never heard of them? Curious?

For more info: http://www.brown.edu/Departments/Music/ensembles/jazzband.html

Students in the Brown University Jazz Combos present a final concert. This event begins at 8 p.m. in the Grant Recital Hall, behind the Orwig Music Building on the corner of Hope St. and Young Orchard Ave.

Here is more information

Title: Brown University Jazz Combos concert

When: Tuesday, March 13, 2012 8:00 PM - 10:00 PM

Where: Grant Recital Hall Behind the Orwig Music Building on the corner of Hope St. and Young Orchard Ave.

Description: Students in the Brown University Jazz Combos perform. Grant Recital Hall is newly renovated and accessible. To request special services, accommodations or assistance for this event, please contact Ashley Lundh [401.863.3234 - Ashley_Lundh@brown.edu] as far in advance of the event as possible.

Cost: Free

Contact: Music Department 401-863-3234

Topical Area: Performance, Concerts, Open to the Public, Music department

Categories: Performance, Open to the Public,

Dept: Music, Audience, Departments, Concerts, Arts and Entertainment

 

At the day of the event, I will send you an email, explaining how to get there and how to reach me at on my cellphone.

We will probably meet earlier in a familiar place first, around Brown, then we will walk together to the concert. 

 

I'm excited already!
item.how_to_find_us: Mo is hosting this one, please look at his picture!!!!
item.name: Brown University Jazz Combos Concert
